name: Rocket Propulsion
description: This course provides an in-depth study of the fundamentals of rocket propulsion, covering topics such as thermodynamics, kinematics, dynamics, space flight, and the design and analysis of various types of rocket engines.
author: Jose Annunziato

name: Aerodynamics
description: This course provides an in-depth study of the fundamentals of aerodynamics, covering topics such as fluid mechanics, airfoil design, and the analysis of lift and drag forces.
author: Jose Annunziato

name: Spacecraft Design
description: This course explains the process of designing spacecraft, including systems engineering, orbit mechanics, and mission planning.
author: Jose Annunziato
